data.title: Racing, Gaming, and More in Sylmar, CA
data.meta_description: Experience the ultimate racing and gamign experience at MB2 Raceway in Sylmar, CA! Race, compete, and track your lap times to guarantee success on the track!
data.text:
Extreme go-kart racing is an entertaining sport for people of all ages, so whether you’re hosting a birthday party for your teenager or looking for a fun activity for a corporate retreat, we satisfy your needs. MB2 Raceway takes fun to the next level when it comes to go-kart racing.

Whether you’re racing against friends or trying to beat your personal record, we record and store your lap times so you can reference them each time you visit. Our go-karts run at speeds of up to 45 miles per hour, so put the pedal to the metal and see how fast you can lap the competition. Indoor karting lets you compete against multiple drivers to see which of your friends is the best racer, and your lap time is proof of your driving abilities on the track. Check out our Trackpass membership so you can seek the thrill any time you have a need for speed!
